T02TD2507E:215b-0: @215b * // thig gdab pa'i cho ga dka' ba spyod pa bzhugs /
T02TD2507E:215b-2: # // 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2507E:215b-3: dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas pa la //
T02TD2507E:215b-4: zur thig phyogs thig mnyam par gdab //
T02TD2507E:215b-5: cha chen nyi shu'i tshad du bya ;
T02TD2507E:215b-6: / bdun pa'i thig ni gzhag par bya //
T02TD2507E:215b-7: de nas cha bran bgo ba ni //
T02TD2507E:215b-8: tshangs pa'i thig gi ngos gnyis kyi //
T02TD2507E:215b-9: cha chen dang po phyed du bgo / phyi yi cha chen de bzhin bgo / cha chan gnyis pa phyed du bya //
T02TD2507E:215b-10: nang gi cha phyed de bzhin bgo / cha chen lnga pa phyi nang gi / cha re gdab cing dbus gnyis gzhag / cha chen drug pa phyed du bya //
T02TD2507E:215b-11: de nas thig skor bya ba ni //
T02TD2507E:215b-12: cha chen bcu pa'i phyed las bskor //
T02TD2507E:215b-13: cha chen dgu dang cha chen brgyad //
T02TD2507E:215b-14: gnyis ka'i mtha' nas bskor bar bya //
T02TD2507E:215b-15: cha chen gsum las mtha' yi ni //
T02TD2507E:215b-16: cha chung gcig las bskor bar bya //
T02TD2507E:215b-17: de las gzhan pa phyi nang gi / bskor ba rgyud kyi gzhung gis so //
T02TD2507E:215b-18: sgo gnyis pa la sogs pa dang //
T02TD2507E:215b-19: rgyud gzhung gi ni rnam dbye yis //
T02TD2507E:215b-20: cha rnams dbri dang bsnan par bya //
T02TD2507E:215b-21: man ngag thob cing mkhas pa yis //
T02TD2507E:215b-22: dkyil 'khor phyi nang gang yin pa'i //
T02TD2507E:215b-23: thig ni sngar bzhin gdab par bya'o ;
T02TD2507E:215b-24: / thig gdab pa'i rim pa dka' ba spyod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon shuddhi pra bhas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
